text: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation and Aerospace University (BSMRAAU) is a public university in Bangladesh. It will be funded by the Government of Bangladesh. This will be Bangladesh's first higher education institution on Aerospace engineering. The university will be established in Lalmonirhat. The first student admission program will begin in January 2020. ==History== On July 11, 2018, the UGC drafted the law and submitted it to the Ministry of Education for setting up This Aviation University. At the meeting of the Council of Ministers on September 28, 2018, the approval for the establishment of BSMRAAU was granted on the same day that three more universities received policy approval. Education Minister Dipu Moni placed the bill in the National Parliament which was passed February 28, 2019. A temporary office has been set up at the old airport at Tejgaon, Dhaka to handle the activities of the university. Air Vice Marshal Fazlul Haque has been appointed as the founding Vice Chancellor of Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Aviation and Aerospace University May 26, 2019. ==Academic Outline== ===Bachelor Degree Program=== *B.
